import matplotlib.pyplot as plt 

alpha=-1.35
log_M0=19
phi=5.96E-11
def schechter_fit(logM):
    schechter = phi*(10**((alpha+1)*(logM-log_M0)))*(np.e**(-pow(10,logM-log_M0)))
    return schechter
